city.cs.engine

Class Sensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • city.cs.engine.Fixture
      • city.cs.engine.Sensor

  • public class Sensor
extends Fixture
    A sensor component of a rigid body. A sensor generates collision events but the collisions have no effect on the parent body's motion. Sensors are not displayed.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Sensor(Body body, Shape shape)
      Create a sensor from a shape.

      Create a sensor from a shape.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sensor

        public Sensor(Body body,
      Shape shape,
      float density)
        Create a sensor from a shape.
        Parameters:
        body - the body the sensor is part of
        shape - the shape of the sensor
        density - the density of the sensor (in kg/square metre)

      • Sensor

        public Sensor(Body body,
      Shape shape)
        Create a sensor from a shape. Default: density = 1.0.
        Parameters:
        body - the body the sensor is part of
        shape - the shape of the sensor

    • Method Detail

      • addSensorListener

        public void addSensorListener(SensorListener listener)
        Register a sensor listener. The listener's beginContact() method is called when a solid fixture begins to overlap with the sensor, and its endContact() method is called when the fixture ceases to overlap.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to add

      • removeSensorListener

        public void removeSensorListener(SensorListener listener)
        Deregister a sensor listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to remove
